titleStmt.title: Maria triumphans Being a discourse, wherein (by way of dialogue) the B. Virgin Mary Mother of God, is defended, and vindicated, from all such dishonours and indignities, with which the precisians of these our dayes, are accustomed vniustly to charge her.
titleStmt.author: N. N., fl. 1635.
Anderton, Lawrence, attributed name. aut

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: N.N.; attributed to Lawrence Anderton by Halkett & Laing.
Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
Running title reads: The triumph of the B. Virgin Mary.
Beginning leaves torn and tightly bound, with some loss of print on pages 246-275.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
